channel.title: Featured Voices on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Featured Voices on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Nate Bargatze’s Boys & Girls Clubs Emmys Bit Was Not as Bad as You Think
item.description: For starters, Bargatze and CBS were never going to stiff the very nonprofit they basically dedicated the show to.

item.title: Nate Bargatze’s Boys & Girls Clubs Emmys Bit Was Not as Bad as You Think
item.description: For starters, Bargatze and CBS were never going to stiff the very nonprofit they basically dedicated the show to.

item.title: No, Hannah, That Wasn’t Brave (Guest Column)
item.description: True courage would have meant calling for peace, for coexistence, for the humanity of both Israelis and Palestinians, even if it risked boos instead of applause, writes Israeli activist Hen Mazzig.

item.title: No, Hannah, That Wasn’t Brave (Guest Column)
item.description: True courage would have meant calling for peace, for coexistence, for the humanity of both Israelis and Palestinians, even if it risked boos instead of applause, writes Israeli activist Hen Mazzig.

item.title: ‘With Love, Meghan’ Sticks to Original Recipe in Season 2 (Unfortunately)
item.description: Season one of the Duchess of Sussex’s Netflix series should’ve served as a taste test; instead, the host and executive producer’s lack of substitutions makes for an equally bland second season.

item.title: ‘With Love, Meghan’ Sticks to Original Recipe in Season 2 (Unfortunately)
item.description: Season one of the Duchess of Sussex’s Netflix series should’ve served as a taste test; instead, the host and executive producer’s lack of substitutions makes for an equally bland second season.

item.title: The NEA Is Under Attack. If You Work in The Entertainment Industry, That Should Scare You.
item.description: The Trump administration’s actions have consequences far beyond the grants in question.

item.title: The NEA Is Under Attack. If You Work in The Entertainment Industry, That Should Scare You.
item.description: The Trump administration’s actions have consequences far beyond the grants in question.

item.title: Why Do the Emmys Hate Taylor Sheridan Shows?
item.description: From ‘Landman’ to ‘1923’ to ‘Yellowstone’ to ‘Tulsa King,’ once again the prolific writer-producer-director’s dramas were almost entirely snubbed.

item.title: Why Do the Emmys Hate Taylor Sheridan Shows?
item.description: From ‘Landman’ to ‘1923’ to ‘Yellowstone’ to ‘Tulsa King,’ once again the prolific writer-producer-director’s dramas were almost entirely snubbed.

item.title: Amazon’s Idaho College Murders Documentary Is Better Than Peacock’s — Except in the Ways It Isn’t
item.description: A pair of docs about the 2022 University of Idaho student murders were released within eight days of each other — and within nine days of the killer’s shocking guilty plea.

item.title: Amazon’s Idaho College Murders Documentary Is Better Than Peacock’s — Except in the Ways It Isn’t
item.description: A pair of docs about the 2022 University of Idaho student murders were released within eight days of each other — and within nine days of the killer’s shocking guilty plea.
